title: Max Box Office Day 2: Only 3.51 Crores Away From Creating History With Highest Opening Weekend In Sandalwood! - Koimoi
summary:
Max Box Office Day 2: Only 3.51 Crores Away From Creating History With Highest Opening Weekend In Sandalwood!

Date: December 26, 2024 Source: Koimoi

Kannada action thriller Max began on an impressive note at the box office. Kichcha Sudeep starrer has unfortunately witnessed a big drop on its second day, despite good reviews.

  • Day 1: 8.7 crores
  • Day 2: 4 crores
  • Total: 12.7 crores

Over 50% drop

As per Sacnilk, Max earned around 4 crores on its day 2 at the Kannada box office. It has witnessed a drop of 54% compared to 8.7 crores on day 1, registering the highest opening for a Sandalwood film in 2024.

Kichcha Sudeep starrer Max only needs 3.51 crores more to score the biggest opening weekend of Sandalwood in 2024.

Stay tuned to Koimoi for more box office updates!
newTitle: Max Box Office Day 2: Only 3.51 Crores Away From Creating History With Highest Opening Weekend In Sandalwood!

title: Pushpa 2 Box Office Collections: Allu Arjun starrer hits 1250cr in India in 3 weeks - PINKVILLA
summary:
Pushpa 2 Box Office Collections: Allu Arjun Starrer Hits 1250 Cr in India in 3 Weeks

Date & Source: Updated on Dec 27, 2024 | Pinkvilla

Pushpa 2 has achieved remarkable success at the box office, crossing Rs. 1250 crore in just three weeks. The film is now closing in on the all-time record held by Baahubali 2.

  • Total gross of Pushpa 2 now stands at Rs. 1257.50 crore.
  • The film grossed Rs. 147.50 crore in its third week alone.
  • It is currently second only to Baahubali 2, being just Rs. 90 crore away from beating its record.
  • The film has performed especially well during the Christmas/New Year holidays.
  • Pushpa 2 has become the second highest-grossing film in Telugu states.
“Riding on its strong momentum and the boost from the New Year holidays, Pushpa 2 is well-positioned to rewrite box office history.”

In conclusion, Pushpa 2's box office performance sets it on course to possibly becoming the highest-grossing Indian film ever, showcasing the power of star power and strategic release timing.
newTitle: Pushpa 2 Box Office Collections: Allu Arjun Starrer Hits 1250 Cr in India in 3 Weeks

Publication Date: December 27, 2024

Bollywood superstar Salman Khan celebrated his 59th birthday with a grand gathering of close friends and family, hosting a more intimate bash at his sister Arpita Khan Sharma's residence, rather than his usual Panvel farmhouse party.

  • Salman is preparing for the trailer launch of his new film 'Sikandar'.
“Mere MAALIK ka birthday hai, love MAALIK (It’s my master’s birthday).” - Shera

title: Sajid Nadiadwala and Salman Khan’s Sikandar teaser delayed in respect of Manmohan Singh’s demise - Bollywood Hungama
summary:
Sikandar Teaser Postponed to Honor Dr. Manmohan Singh

Publication Date: December 27, 2024 Source: Bollywood Hungama

In respect of the late former Prime Minister of India, Dr. Manmohan Singh, the teaser for Salman Khan's film Sikandar has been postponed to December 28.

  • The teaser was initially set for release on December 27 at 11:07 AM, coinciding with Khan's birthday.
  • Nadiadwala Grandson announced the postponement via social media.
  • Dr. Manmohan Singh passed away on December 26 at the age of 92.
  • Singh's contributions to India’s economic policies earned him immense respect.
“In light of the passing of our esteemed former Prime Minister Manmohan Singh Ji, we regret to announce that the release of the Sikandar teaser has been postponed.” - #TeamSikandar

The decision reflects the team's respect for the late leader during a time of national mourning.
newTitle: Sikandar Teaser Postponed to Honor Dr. Manmohan Singh

title: Salman Khan’s Sikandar teaser delayed in respect of Manmohan Singh’s demise - Bollywood Hungama
summary:
Salman Khan's Sikandar Teaser Postponed Due to Manmohan Singh's Demise

Publication Date: December 27, 2024 Source: Bollywood Hungama

In a mark of respect to the late former Prime Minister Dr. Manmohan Singh, the makers of Salman Khan’s film Sikandar have postponed the teaser's release originally set for December 27.

  • The teaser will now be released on December 28 at 11:07 AM.
  • The decision comes after Singh's passing on December 26 at the age of 92.
  • The makers expressed condolences in their official statement.
  • Singh served as India’s Prime Minister from 2004 to 2014 and was a key figure in economic reforms.
“In light of the passing of our esteemed former Prime Minister Manmohan Singh Ji, we regret to announce that the release of the Sikandar teaser has been postponed to 28th December 11:07 AM. Our thoughts are with the nation during this time of mourning.” — Nadiadwala Grandson

The postponement reflects the filmmakers' respect for Singh's legacy and the sentiments of the nation.
newTitle: Salman Khan's Sikandar Teaser Postponed Due to Manmohan Singh's Demise

Actress Srishty Rode, known from Bigg Boss 12, shared her distressing experience of being hospitalized in Amsterdam due to pneumonia during her vacation.

  • Srishty Rode fell severely ill while on vacation in Amsterdam, requiring hospitalization.
  • She expressed her fear about returning to India during her hospital stay.
  • Shared on social media, she thanked fans for their support during her recovery.
  • She revealed her visa expired while she was ill and is currently recovering in Mumbai.
  • Rode is known for her roles in several television shows and her stint on The Kapil Sharma Show.
“I got seriously sick with pneumonia while in Amsterdam, and it hit me hard. My oxygen levels suddenly dropped, and I was in the hospital, fighting so hard…scared that if I’d even make it home.”

While Srishty is still weak, she remains hopeful and is focusing on her recovery with the support of her fans and friends.

title: Salman Khan birthday: Wanted by brands, the Sultan of staying relevant - Exchange4Media
Pushpa 2 The Rule worldwide box office collection day 22: Allu Arjun’s blockbuster demolishes Rs 1700 crore barrier; Baahubali 2’s record about to topple - The Indian Express
summary:
Pushpa 2 The Rule worldwide box office collection day 22

Publication Date: December 27, 2024 Source: Indian Express

Pushpa 2: The Rule, featuring Allu Arjun, is making waves at the box office, having crossed the Rs 1700 crore milestone worldwide just 22 days after its release, boosted by the holiday season.

  • The film earned Rs 9.6 crore net on day 22, bringing its total domestic collection to Rs 1119.2 crore.
  • It recorded a Telugu occupancy rate of 23.27% across over 500 shows and approximately 19.08% occupancy in Hindi with over 3000 shows.
  • Pushpa 2 is now the highest-grossing Indian film of 2024 and is expected to surpass Baahubali 2’s lifetime global gross.
  • The film's success is attributed to its engaging storyline and strong performances by its cast, including Rashmika Mandanna and Fahadh Faasil.
  • Newer releases struggled at the box office in comparison, with Baby John and Viduthalai 2 failing to gain traction.
"The success of Pushpa 2: The Rule is a testament to the power of well-made films to draw in audiences and create a lasting impact."

The incredible performance of Pushpa 2 highlights its widespread appeal, and anticipation builds for potential future installments in this franchise.
newTitle: Pushpa 2 Breaks Rs 1700 Crore at the Box Office
